metadata.name: GM to All My Creatures
metadata.description:
"GM to All My Creatures" is a captivating piece of art that presents Jesus in a relatable and human manner, holding a cup of morning coffee. The artist masterfully captures Jesus' tired and strained expression, emphasizing the challenges faced by even the divine during the early hours of the day. Grasping the cup of coffee, we are reminded that even the most sacred figures share our struggles and the need for a morning pick-me-up.

The piece goes beyond conventional portrayals of Jesus and invites viewers to empathize with the Son of God in his moment of vulnerability. The title, "GM to All My Creatures," conveys the idea that Jesus' love and compassion encompass all beings, even as he faces his own difficulties. This artwork is a thought-provoking exploration of the intersection between the divine and the ordinary, encouraging us to find solace in the shared experiences that unite us all.
